com.ezrebclan.asset.core

Class AssetIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ezrebclan.asset.core.AssetIndex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.json.JSONString

    public class AssetIndex
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.json.JSONString
    An AssetIndex is a JSON-Serializable object that holds information about an Asset, including the name and type of data.
    It also holds a JSONObject, details, which can contain anything you want it to.
    Author:
    Mrab Ezreb

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String assetName
      The name of the asset
      private org.json.JSONObject details
      Any extra details about the asset
      private java.lang.String type
      The asset's type

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AssetIndex(org.json.JSONObject json)
      This constructor is used to get an AssetIndex object from an asset's index.json file
      AssetIndex(java.lang.String assetName, java.lang.String type)
      This constructor sets the asset's name and storedname, and it also sets the asset's details to a EmptyDetails object.
      AssetIndex(java.lang.String assetName, java.lang.String type, org.json.JSONObject details)
      Use this constructor to set the asset's name, storedname, and details all in one fell swoop.
